actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that estimated tax payments shall not be required from individuals whose tax liability, reduced by withholding, is less than $2,000.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that estimated tax payments shall not be required from individuals whose tax liability, reduced by withholding, is less than $2,000 (currently, $500).

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that estimated tax payments shall not be required from individuals whose tax liability, reduced by withholding, is less than $2,000.
